data.message: I never never done this. I love your music. You Eminem VB are the only reason I'm going for my microbiology batchlors. I was so angry for so long. But it was you that told me that I need to work harder. My mom, who I thought was a god.... well her influence held make me. I'm going for my microbiology batchlor if I can as afford it. But, you!!!!!! You gave me hope!!!!! I can do it!!!! The stupid one, the problem B child, the fuck up one, the add, the ADHD, the oCd , the whatever she could get a pretty party for.  No matter VB of you read this or not I want you to know how Ve re t important you were , and have been in my life. I would not be half the mom Iam if it was not for you. So thank you. You gave me technical my angel, and made me understand a little bit how my mom could do what she did to me. I may not ever forgive her for blaming for her divorce\second child.

replies.message: Always remember V you speak for those anger children VB who love their parents.
Keep making music, kids need you to survive.
